title: Hatchy
author: Hatchy
content: https://www.torizone.com/posts/2023/04/109273-buhari-apologizes-administration-caused-painWen I see dis matter, I just smile dey reason, why e come dey tell us sorry when he knows say e no fit run we country but still put hand, come spoil everything. I no know watin he dey think say Nigerians go just forgive and forget every evil thing wey him tenure do us? Many life's lost, insecurity, hunger, death and many homes broken. How Nigerians wan take hear sorry? ¬†I wan us this opportunity take give una a quick review or summary of things wey happen during his 8 year of ruling wey begin on the 20 may, 2015.2015: the Boko Haram matter wey come increase well well for the north. Many families die, communities destroy upon say the Nigeria army still try intervene for the matter.make we no forget say our presido promise say if e enter chair, e go catch all these Boko Haram them but nothing wey he fit do.2016: the economy come fall well well, fuel price ¬†and other oil products come dey scarcel. All these matter wey come lead to economic recession.2017:Dem come launch the anti corruption campaign matter wey Dem talk say them wan take remove all these our bad corrupt oga them for any government position. But no be all of them Dem still commot the question na why?2018: matter of the herds men, wey come dey drive our people Dem wey dey carry farm commot from bush. Them dey kidnapp some, ask for big money while the women, them go rape them. This wan con cause our people no to dey go farm well well, wey come lead to low supply of food for the country.2019: this wan na after e First 4 years, e con start with closure of boarder land with all neighboring country them. We e talk say e wan try reduce smuggling of goods and make Nigeria for become a productive country not a consuming wan. This matter come kill the economy well well, as people no see food chop.2020:the end sars matter, wey start to end the brutality wey the anti robbery squad them dey run for the country. This matter come latter lead to the lekki tool gatematter wey happen on 20, October 2020. Peaceful protesters gather, government come deploy army them wey come open live fire. This wan lead to many death, many people injure. But the Nigeria government denial this matter say na fake bullet them shoot.2020/2021: covid 19 matter, why affect the whole world. Then Dem con supply food stuffs give each state for we ¬†country make Dem take give citizens, but the governments come dey hide them for secret warehouses and no give them out to the public.our people Dem come vex go dey break all the warehouse.2022: the Asuu lockdown wey start as at around Feb 2022 come end for October ¬†2022.The matter we government no gree take serious come make students dey hux for 9 months and dis wan kill education sector well well for the country.Fuel price come reach 250 per litre and scarcity come dey. Transport increase, food price increase but them no do anything.Early 2023, central bank come change currency and them con talk say make bank stop to dey collect old notes.this matter come lead to scarcity in paper money, no new notes because all our oga them don hide am say Dem wan use am take run elections.I no really know watin I go talk again,but e be like say all the years wey Buhari take rule the country na suffer here and there. These people them families no dey the country so e no concern them watin happen to we common people. Soon them go swear in a new government, I wan ask una watin una dey expect. Abi na the same suffer we go still see Or Nigeria go better? I no dey against we president Sha oo e try wey e take apologize, but no be everybody go take that apology. My people abeg watin una talk for this matter?Quoteall the information about the dates wey dis matter take happen fit no day accurate, but I do research from different search engine including google [\quote]

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Menh my bro all this matter tire person, but wetin I noticed be say our people them no dey take anything serious whereby any government go just rule us do whatever them know say e sweet them run and at last them come still apologize again say wetin happened?Abi we country na nollywood movie where at last the evil doer go come confess of their did and we go just forgive them like that without any serious punishment?This same people wey we know say no go fit do well na them we still go vote there again and wetin we go expect as a result, do you want to expect a positive works or negative works after we don go sell our rights finished for small pepper wey I know say e no go last for our cook pots if we carry am cook.Like this we are getting ready to put another sets of illiterate governments who don't have human feelings and love for one another, na so we been do wen Jonathan dey seat, now we don see who strong pass us every body don close mouth.I know say Tinubu no go fit rule this country because him drug cases don ignite again and like this him still dey serious issues about that one but make we see how e goes because God of the poor aren't sleeping.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: This is what is called medicine after death after everything wey Nigerians don pass through for em hand during his 8 years journey of being the President of Nigeria, he now decide to apologize because em know sae em rulership scattered Nigerians as a whole. Shey em the think sae being the president of Nigeria na do or die affair that he must rule the country. If em no win the 2015¬† presidential election blood must spills. For peace to reign Goodluck Jonathan accept defeat so that em go rule wetin em d contest for as a president since 2007. The opportunity was given to him since 2015 to rule Nigerians and na this em end of 8 years tenure na we wan begin to apologize to Nigerians for wetin em bad government don cause. No be full-blown juju be that? Wetin I know be sae, I, and other millions of Nigerians will never accept this em apology. Let God and humanity judge him for everything wey em don cause for this our country period.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: The mata sopoz tire anyone wey be naija pesin no be lie. D oda day, I bin dey reminisce on how di contri don go down since Buhari enta power and wia e choke pass na for prices of food and fuel; although e no be like say security get hope o but these areas really choke the common man. ¬†We presido feel say nah apology go erase all the pain wey him administration don cause? I read for Bible say time go come wey you go get money, but you no fit use am, at least, many Nigerians experience such during the cashless policy wey him and Emiefele bin dey try to go for.¬†I doubt, just like @Marykeller tok, say dis apology go change anything.

comments.body: Most times na we wey be naija people dey cause our problems, I remember Goodluck Jonathan regime wey we been dey manage, na this amaechi with en group of Politicians go uproot buhari from no where come campaign carry power give am, na from that time we start to deh miss Goodluck Jonathan, buhari just come make everywhere hard for we country, the full buhari 8 years na problems upon problems for our naija, recently I hear news wey buhari dey apologize to Nigerians say en know say en no try, now Dem don come again with tinubu, tinubu wey carry plenty wahala, but I just hope say God fit help us because if wetin happen for buhari government repeat itself eh, plenty people no go survive am....

comments.body: Na so oooh, the uncle bubu tenure don finish like this oooh and nothing good comes out of it oooh all the promises wey e promise no one come to pass,na things e come spoil more and more ooh,na e make am dey say sorry for the Nigerian ooh,Chai after the 8year in bondage you the open mouth üëÑüëÑ dey tell us sorry but make I ask question ‚ùì na true say e dey tell us sorry abi na e lie lie Muhammad dey tell us another lie and e dey tell us sorry but e dey still dey disobey court order dey go that one e mean say e dey sorry abi na crocodile üêäüêäüêä tears üò≠üò≠üò≠.Again make i ask another question ‚ùì sorry wey e dey tell us now wetin e fit do? the life wey don lost na sorry go fit bring am back,abi make the family chop sorry,so na another words na e do bring come out again oooh APC government, (1)come to APC and your sins are forgiven,(2)if you don't like the outcome of the election you go to court (3) after ruling bad, kill people everyday and night and borrow the All money wey dey for China come put for our heads at the end of your tenure you go come say sorry oooh,no be juju be that....

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: My brother this one were be say na only the bad things for this administration you come list for this you summary of Buhary APC led 8 years administration, ¬†come make the matter tire me ooo, and sake of say you no even take cooler mind hammer the truth you come bring amm out as raw as it is come make my wound reopen. But the one that get me amazed the most is the recent redesigning and currency swap game were we country bank Offical come carry come, as Emefele carry the policy for head like say him know waiten him dey do, umtill late we come discover say the so called Emefel os as confused as the Buhari himself, and it now down on us that that eye glass were the CBN governor the wear no get level na to use am cover him shame and incompetence. How them go suffer Nigerians for that long for a national policy that they are not prepared for And instead of first experimenting it, they went ahead to implementation which now has resulted in policy summer sort and it's now a shame on the government. This alone have rounded up this administration as a 100% failure and the worst government ever in the history of Nigeria.

comments.body: My man wetin buhari government don make people see no be small thing oh but we no go talk anything God go make things better for us make we just pray for better Nigeria, but these apc tenure no good at all imagine all this things wey you mentioned happen for one person tenure and that person they office just they look like idol, as if no be blood they flow for him body. Nothing pain me like na ASSU strike wey people go stay for house for 9 months when another people one year study don they another level we waste am for house while they pikin they abroad or private schools they study no mind if we get or we no get na them self they know and they call them self leaders.
